title: L.L. Cool J - Hey Lover (MP3@320) [FrankFoo]
description:
L.L. Cool J - Hey Lover (MP3@320)

"Hey Lover" is the first single released from LL Cool J's sixth album, Mr. Smith, 
it featured Boyz II Men. 

It was released on October 31, 1995 for Def Jam Recordings and was produced by 
The Trackmasters and LL Cool J. 

Hey Lover would prove to be the most successful single from the album, making 
it to 3 on both the Billboard Hot 100 and Hot R&B/Hip-Hop songs charts, as 
well as 17 on the UK Singles Chart. 

The song sampled Michael Jackson's "The Lady in My Life" from the Thriller album, 
thus Rod Temperton, the writer of that song, was given credit as a writer of 
this song. 

Linage: CD > EAC > flac > dbPoweramp > MP3

Included: NFO, PLS, M3U
Covers: Front 
Tags: ID3 v1.1, ID3 v2.3
